books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Al Franken
books.description: A memoir by the Democratic senator from Minnesota and former “Saturday Night Live” writer and performer.
books.name: AL FRANKEN, GIANT OF THE SENATE

books.author: by Newt Gingrich
books.description: The former House speaker explains the president’s philosophy and political agenda.
books.name: UNDERSTANDING TRUMP

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Kevin Hart with Neil Strauss
books.description: The comedian’s personal and professional life.
books.name: I CAN'T MAKE THIS UP

books.author: by Mark Bowden
books.description: An account of the Tet offensive battle that was a turning point in the American war in Vietnam.
books.name: HUE 1968

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg and Adam Grant
books.description: Sandberg’s experience after her husband’s sudden death and Grant’s psychological research combine to provide insight on facing adversity and building resilience.
books.name: OPTION B

books.author: by Roxane Gay
books.description: The fiction writer and essayist’s memoir about life as a “woman of size.”
books.name: HUNGER

books.author: by David Fisher
books.description: Stories of the Civil War; a companion to the Fox historical docudrama.
books.name: BILL O'REILLY'S LEGENDS AND LIES: THE CIVIL WAR

books.author: by Sherman Alexie
books.description: The Indian writer’s memoir of his complicated relationship with his mother.
books.name: YOU DON'T HAVE TO SAY YOU LOVE ME

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood. Originally published in 2005 and the basis of a forthcoming movie.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the comedian, now the host of “The Daily Show.”
books.name: BORN A CRIME

books.author: by Diane Ackerman
books.description: How a Warsaw couple sheltered Jews and members of the Resistance during World War II. Originally published in 2007; now the basis of a movie.
books.name: THE ZOOKEEPER’S WIFE
